monogr.title: ECONOMIC: Pertains to the economic impacts of a policy
CAPACITY & RESOURCES: Pertains to lack of or availability of resources
MORALITY & ETHICS: Motivated by religious doctrine, righteousness, sense of responsibility
FAIRNESS & EQUALITY: Of how laws, punishments, resources, etc. are distributed among groups
Including court cases, restriction and expressions of rights
CRIME & PUNISHMENT: Policy violation and consequences
SECURITY & DEFENSE: Threats or defenses/preemptive actions to protect against threats
HEALTH & SAFETY: Includes care access and effectiveness

analytic.title: POLITICAL FACTORS & IMPLICATIONS: Efforts, stances, filibusters, lobbying, references to other politicians 13. POLICY DESCRIPTION, PRESCRIPTION, & EVALUATION: Discusses effectiveness of current or proposed policies 14. EXTERNAL REGULATION AND REPUTATION: Interstate and international relationships of the U.S. 15. FACTUAL: Expresses a pure fact, with no detectable political spin 16. (SELF) PROMOTION: Promotes another person or the author in some way, e.g. television appearances 17. PERSONAL SYMPATHY & SUPPORT: Expresses sympathy, emotional response, or solidarity with others References Rob

monogr.title: Effects on individual and community life 10. CULTURAL IDENTITY: Culture's norms, trends, customs 11. PUBLIC SENTIMENT: Pertains to opinions, polling, and demographics 12
